title: Alyssa Satin Capucilli: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Beloved children's author Alyssa Satin Capucilli is the author of the popular books about the little yellow puppy named Biscuit. On September 15, 2012 Alyssa read from her books and answered questions from an audience at the Apple Store, SoHo.
itunes:summary: Beloved children's author Alyssa Satin Capucilli is the author of the popular books about the little yellow puppy named Biscuit. On September 15, 2012 Alyssa read from her books and answered questions from an audience at the Apple Store, SoHo.
